mt0: <pad> We are against the thieves of public money, as well as the ones who provide the means for this, and against the ones who misuse their power. We must strengthen the spirit of the businessman who helps the country with his mind, his money, his investment and his work. Therefore, the fight against economic terrorism is undoubtedly a fundamental component that must be implemented.</s>

en: Fortunately all or most of our ministers and government officials in charge of economic activities are present in this meeting.
hau: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa dukkanin ko kuma mafi yawa daga cikin ministocin tattalin arziki da jami'an gwamnati na bangarorin tattalin arziki suna nan a wannan wajen.
mt0: <pad> The good news is that all or most of the economic ministers and officials of the economic department are here in this room.</s>

en: Well, you heard the comments of those who spoke in this meeting: both the comments about your strengths and the suggestions which were indicative of the existence of certain shortcomings. I hereby ask our government officials to carefully think about the comments they heard today.
hau: To sun ji abubuwan da wadanda suka yi magana suka fadi; wato shin bangarorin da suka yi magana kan ababe masu kyau da aka aikata ne ko kuma irin shawarwarin da suka fadi wadanda suke nuni da irin nakasin da ake da su. Ina kiranku da ku sanya ido sosai kan abubuwan da kuka ji, sannan kuma ku yi tunani da nazari kansu.
mt0: <pad> They have heard what the speakers said; whether they were speaking about good things done or giving constructive criticism. I urge you to pay close attention to what you have heard, and to think and reflect on it.</s>

en: We must not let comments be made and then do nothing.
hau: Kada mu bari abubuwan da aka fadin su kare a nan.
mt0: <pad> Don't let the debate end here.</s>

en: Mr. Tavakkoli complained that you did not mention the negative points. I would disagree with him because when you suggest that a certain thing should be done, it means that it has not been done yet and this shows that there are certain shortcomings and problems.
hau: Na'am duk da cewa Malam Tawakkuli ya yi kukan cewa me ya sa ba a fadin abubuwa marasa kyau da ake da su; me ya sa (an fadi mana) a lokacin da aka gabatar da shawarwarin cewa wajibi ne a gudanar da kaza, hakan yana nufin cewa ba a gudanar da shi ba ne; wanda hakan yana nuni ne da wasu daga cikin nakasi da matsalolin da ake da su ne.
mt0: <pad> No, though the Imam Tawakkul complained that why isn't mentioned the bad things; why is it said that when the recommendations are made that something should be done, it means that it isn't done; which shows some of the flaws and problems that exist.</s>

en: He should only pay careful attention to the suggestions which were made in this meeting and I believe they were good suggestions that deserve investigation. There are many things that remain to be said in this regard. I will only make a few recommendations.
hau: Idan har aka lura da wadannan shawararwari, lalle a ra'ayina wadannan shawarwari ne masu kyau wadanda za a iya yin nazari da tuntuni kansu. Akwai abubuwan fadi da yawa a wannan bangaren, zan yi ishara ne da wadansu abubuwa guda biyu zuwa uku; daya daga cikin su kira ne ga cibiyoyin gwamnati da abin ya shafa, daya bangaren kuma na gaba daya ne.
mt0: <pad> If these suggestions are considered, I think they are good suggestions that can be considered and acted upon. There are many things to say in this regard, I will only refer to two or three; one of them is a call to the relevant government authorities, the other is a general appeal.</s>

en: The first recommendation is about full implementation of the policies that have been formulated to support the production sector. Production is the basis of economy.
hau: Na farko, batun gudanar da siyasar taimakawa bangaren da ke samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata ne. Samar da kayayyaki shi ne asasin tattalin arziki; tushen tattalin arziki na kasa ne.
mt0: <pad> First, the purpose of a policy is to help the sector that provides the necessities. Production is the basis of economic activity; it is the source of economic activity in a country.</s>

en: Production is the main pillar of our economy. Regarding the subsidy redistribution plan and the enormous efforts that the government is making in this area, attention should be paid to supporting the production sector, just as it has been pointed out in the law - namely, the 30 percent that has been specified.
hau: Dangane da batun manufantar da irin rangwamin da gwamnati ta ke bayarwa cikin kayayyakin bukatu na yau da kullum da kuma ayyukan da ta faro su a wannan fagen, lalle wajibi ne a lura da irin goyon bayan da za a ba wa bangaren samar da abubuwan da ake bukata; kamar yadda ya zo cikin doka: wato wannan kashi 30 cikin dari din da aka ayyana.
mt0: <pad> In order to ensure the efficiency of government subsidies and the work it has done in this field, it is necessary to take into account the support for the provision of necessities; as stated in the law: that is, the 30 percent provided by the law.</s>

en: Of course some government officials who spoke with me believe that this 30 percent is not really needed.
hau: Ko da yake wasu daga cikin jami'an gwamnati da muka yi magana da su, sun yi amanna da cewa babu bukatar wannan kashi 30 cikin darin.
mt0: <pad> Although some of the government officials we talked to agreed that there was no need for this 30 percent.</s>

en: Certain sectors may not need government support, but in any case production requires support from the government. The production sector should receive its share of support.
hau: Mai yiyuwa ne lamarin ya zamanto haka a wasu bangarorin, to amma dai ala kulli hal bangaren samar da kayyaki yana bukatar goyon bayan cibiyoyin gwamnati.
mt0: <pad> It may be true in other areas, but in any case the production sector needs the support of government agencies.</s>

en: We have certain enterprises that are directly or indirectly hurt by these sanctions and it is necessary to take this point into consideration.
hau: Akwai bangarorin da ko dai kai tsaye ko kuma ta wata hanyar wannan takunkumi ya cutar da su, don haka wajibi ne mu amfana da hakan.
mt0: <pad> There are sectors that have been directly or indirectly affected by this sanction, so it is our duty to take advantage of it.</s>

en: Of course the private sector has certain obligations to fulfill in this regard: economizing on energy consumption, increasing productivity and using new machinery.
hau: To amma tabbas bangaren ‘yan kasuwan ma yana da wani nauyi a wuyansa a wannan bangaren: (da suka hada da) tsumulmula wajen amfani da makamashi, kara matsayin amfani da kuma sabunta injunan da ake da su.
mt0: <pad> But the business sector has a responsibility in this regard: (including) energy conservation, improved use and modernization of existing engines.</s>

en: Certain government officials complained to me that owners of certain industries are not interested in replacing their old machinery, which produce low output and consume a lot of energy. They complained that even if these people are provided with financial assistance, they will not use it to replace their old machinery with new machinery.
hau: Wasu daga cikin jami'an gwamnati sun kawo min kukan cewa wasu daga cikin masu kamfanonin ba su yi wani abin a zo a gani wajen sabunta irin injunan da suke da su wadanda sun tsufa kuma suna amfani da makamashi sosai; idan har aka ba su rangwamin (da gwamnati take bayarwa din), ba za su yi amfani da shi ba.
mt0: <pad> Some government officials complained to me that some companies did not do enough to upgrade their old and energy-consuming machines; if they were offered the subsidies (the government's subsidies), they would not use them.</s>

en: It is necessary to pay attention to this point.
hau: To wajibi ne a lura da wannan lamarin.
mt0: <pad> It is necessary to take care of this matter.</s>

en: Needless to say, government supervision is very important in this regard. That is to say, the government should provide support and it should also supervise the companies that it supports.
hau: Ko da yake sanya idon gwamnati a wannan fagen ma lamari ne mai muhimmanci; wato a gefen irin wadannan taimako da gwamnati take bayarwa, wajibi ne kuma a sanya ido.
mt0: <pad> However, government monitoring in this field is also important; that is, besides the government's support for such activities, it is also necessary to monitor them.</s>

en: The production sector should be provided with as much financial assistance as has been specified in the law, but care should be taken not to allow the people I spoke about - namely, opportunistic people - to use government's financial assistance for other purposes. I have received reports that different kinds of such diversions have happened in the country.
hau: A ba da irin rangwamin da ya kamata a bayar; to amma kuma a sanya ido a kan irin wadannan mutanen da na yi ishara da su - wato masu mummunan amfani da damar da aka ba su - wajen ganin ba su yi amfani da shi din wajen wani aikin na daban ba, wanda hakan yana faruwa kuma muna da labarin hakan bisa rahotanin da aka fitar.
mt0: <pad> He has given the kind of discount that he should have given; but he also has to watch out for the people I mentioned - the misuse of the opportunity - to see that they don't use it for another purpose, which is what happens and we know it from the report.</s>

en: It is necessary to deal with such things in a decisive way so that honest producers who are interested in hard work and production can fulfill their responsibilities.
hau: Wajibi ne a fuskanci wannan lamari da dukkan karfi don masu kamfanoni na gaskiya masu tsarkin zuciya da son yin aiki su sami damar gudanar da ayyukansu.
mt0: <pad> It is necessary to address this issue with all the forces available to allow honest, sincere and ambitious businessmen to run their business.</s>

en: The next point is the issue of imports which was briefly mentioned in this meeting and which I have discussed on many occasions with government officials in charge of imports.
hau: Batu na gaba shi ne batun shigo da kayayyaki; wanda a nan ma an yi ishara da hakan, sannan kuma a lokuta da dama na sha magana da jami'ai kan wannan batu na shigo da kayayyaki.
mt0: <pad> The next issue is the importation of goods; which has been mentioned here, and I have often talked with officials about the importation of goods.</s>

en: Of course nobody is opposed to importing, but it is necessary to regulate and to control imports.
hau: Babu wani wanda yake adawa da shigo da kayayyaki; to amma wajibi ne a tsara yanayin shigo da kayayyakin, a sanya ido kansu.
mt0: <pad> No one is against imports; but it is necessary to plan the conditions of imports, to supervise them.</s>

en: Just because we want certain goods to be available on the market on certain occasions - for example, during Norouz - is not a good justification for increasing imports.
hau: Mujarradin saboda kada mu bari a sami wani lokaci - a matsayin misali ranakun kusa da idi - ya zamanto an rasa wani kaya a kasuwa, ba dalili ne mai girma da zai sanya mu kara irin mizanin kayayyakin da muke shigowa da su ba.
mt0: <pad> Although we have not allowed for a time - for example the days around Eid - to lose some goods in the market, it is not a big reason to increase the volume of goods that we import.</s>

en: It is necessary to pay attention to domestic production when making decisions about imports.
hau: Wajibi ne a lura da abubuwan da ake samarwa a cikin gida.
mt0: <pad> It is necessary to monitor the production of domestic products.</s>

en: Of course it is said that imports contribute to competitiveness of domestic production. It is argued that in the absence of imports, domestic producers would not pay attention to the quality or final price of their products.
hau: Ko da yake an fadi cewa shigowa da kaya zai taimaka wa abubuwan da ake samarwa na cikin gida; idan har ba a shigo da kayayyaki daga waje ba masu samar da kayayyaki na cikin gida ba za su ba da muhimmanci ga kyaun kayayyaki da kuma farashin kayan ba; wato shigo da kaya daga waje zai tilasta musu yin hakan.
mt0: <pad> Although it has been said that imports will help domestic production; without imports, the domestic producers would not be able to pay attention to quality and price; that is, imports will force them to do so.</s>

en: I believe the logic behind this argument is not strong.
hau: Ni dai a ra'ayina wannan ba dalili ne mai karfi ba.
mt0: <pad> In my opinion, this is not a strong reason.</s>

en: Regarding the issue of imports, I would like to draw special attention to the agricultural sector. I believe importing agricultural products requires a far stronger justification than is currently presented.
hau: Dangane da lamarin shigo da kayayyaki musamman ma kan kayayyakin gona. A ra'ayina batun shigo da kayayyakin aikin gona daga waje lamari ne da ke bukatar karfaffen dalili sama da abin da a yau mutum yake gani kafin a yarda da shi.
mt0: <pad> In regards to importing goods, especially farm products. In my opinion the issue of importing farm products from abroad needs a stronger argument than what one is seeing today before it can be accepted.</s>

en: In the agricultural sector we produce outstanding products.
hau: A bangaren aikin gona dai muna da kayayyaki masu kyaun gaske.
mt0: <pad> In the agricultural department, we have very good quality materials.</s>

en: One of the gentlemen presented a report about our produce.
hau: Daya daga cikin malamai ya gabatar da wani rahoto kan amfanin gona na lambu (‘ya'yan itatuwa) da ake samarwa.
mt0: <pad> One of the teachers presented a report on the production of garden fruits.</s>

en: In the area of produce, our country is among the best in the world in terms of quality.
hau: Kasar mu dai a wannan bangaren tana daga cikin kasashe na gaba gaba na duniya.
mt0: <pad> Our country is one of the leading countries in the world.</s>

en: We should be able to increase our products.
hau: Wajibi ne mu kara irin abubuwan da muke samarwa.
mt0: <pad> We have to increase the quality of our products.</s>

en: We should export these garden and farm products so that the world understands what is going on in Iran and we must not import the same products with far worse quality from Latin America or other places.
hau: Mu dinga fitar da wadannan kayayyaki na gona da lambuna don duniya ta dinga ganin abubuwan da ake da su a Iran; ba wai mu dinga shigo da irin wadannan kayayyaki daga a matsayin misali kasashen Latin Amurka da nan da can wadanda kayayyaki ne da ba su kai irin wadanda muke da su a nan ba.
mt0: <pad> We should export these farm and garden products to show the world what we have in Iran; not import these products from for example Latin America and so on, which are products that are not as good as what we have here.</s>

en: The next point is related to the issue of exports.
hau: Batu na gaba shi ne batun fitar da kayayyaki zuwa waje.
mt0: <pad> The next issue is the export of goods.</s>

en: Of course the government has a duty to support exports and exporters.
hau: Tabbas gwamnati tana da nauyi a wuyanta na ta taimaka wa masu fitar da kayayyakin.
mt0: <pad> However, the government has a duty to support exporters.</s>

en: As one of the gentlemen reported, fortunately there has been a very good growth in non-oil exports and we will have a faster growth in the future. We expect non-oil exports to grow appropriately so that our exports become more than our imports.
hau: Abin farin cikin - kamar yadda daya daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya yi ishara da hakan - shi ne cewa kayayyakin da muke fitarwa wadanda ba man fetur ba sun samu karuwa da kuma ci gaba; a nan gaba ma za su kara samun ci gaban; a nan gaba muna da fatan cewa za mu sami ci gaban da ake bukata ta yadda mizanin abubuwan da muke fitarwa da wadanda muke shigo da su za su zamanto masu amfanarwa.
mt0: <pad> The good news - as one of the brothers indicated - is that our non-oil export has grown and will continue to grow; we hope that in the future we will have the necessary development so that the ratio of our export and import will be profitable.</s>

en: This is the point we should reach and we should be independent of oil revenues.
hau: Kamata ya yi mu kai matsayin da za mu iya wadatuwa da kudaden shiga da ake samunsu ta hanyar man fetur.
mt0: <pad> We must reach the point where we can be independent of our oil revenues.</s>

en: Dependence on oil revenues is one of the most important economic woes of our country and it has not just plagued our economy: it has been a general problem.
hau: Daya daga cikin manyan bala'oin da suke fuskantar bangaren tattalin arzikin mu da kuma dukkanin arzikin kasar nan na gaba daya, shi ne dogaro da kudaden shigar da ake samunsu ta hanyar man fetur.
mt0: <pad> One of the major challenges facing our economic sector and the whole of the country's economy is the dependence on the inflows from oil.</s>

en: We must reach a point where we can stop our exports due to political or economic considerations for a period of 15 days or one month if we decide to do so. I made this point several years ago, but at that time our government officials did not welcome my suggestion.
hau: A shekarun da suka gabata na fadi - ko da ya ke a wancan lokacin jami'an gwamnatin ba su na'am da hakan ba - wajibi ne mu kai ga matsayin da idan har a wata rana saboda lamurra na siyasa da kuma tattalin arziki na duniya mu ka yanke shawarar dakatar da sayar da man fetur din mu a matsayin misali na kwanaki sha biyar ko kuma wata guda, za mu iya yin haka.
mt0: <pad> In the past years I have said - although at that time government officials did not agree with it - that we must be able to reach a point where we can stop our oil sales for 15 days or a month, for example, if we decide on political and economic reasons.</s>

en: Imagine what would happen in the world.
hau: Ku duba ku ga wani irin abu ne zai faru a duniya.
mt0: <pad> I think something will happen in the world.</s>

en: Today we cannot do so because we are in need of oil revenues.
hau: A yau dai ba za mu iya yin hakan ba, saboda kuwa muna da bukatar wadannan kudaden shigan.
mt0: <pad> Today we can't do that, because we need these revenues.</s>

en: If one day our economy becomes independent of oil revenues and oil exports, the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic will manage to gain this advantage, which will have an extraordinary effect on the world.
hau: A duk ranar da tattalin arzikin kasar nan ya wadatu daga dogaro da kudaden shiga na man fetur, to kuwa al'ummar Iran da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci a Iran za su sami wani irin karfi ta yadda tasirinsu zai zamanto mai karfin gaske a duniya.
mt0: <pad> Every day that the economy of Iran is freed from its dependence on oil revenues, the people of Iran and the Islamic Republic of Iran will gain such strength that their influence will be so strong in the world.</s>

en: This is the point we must reach. Well, this requires support. It is necessary to support exports.
hau: Wajibi ne mu cimma hakan. To hakan dai lamari ne da ke bukatar taimako da goyon baya; wajibi ne a goya wa wannan lamari na fitar da kayayyaki waje baya.
mt0: <pad> We have to achieve that. But this is a process that needs help and support; we have to support the export industry.</s>

en: On the other hand, our exporters and those in charge of exports have certain duties to fulfill. Wrong actions of our exporters would show their effect in the case the countries that are the major destinations of our exports. It is bad to send low-quality products and products with unfavorable packaging and it is bad to have delays in delivery.
hau: To a wannan bangaren ma su kansu masu fitar da kayan da kuma jami'ansu suna da wani nauyi a wuyansu. Su kansu wadannan kasashen da aka yi ishara da cewa mafi yawa daga cikin kayayyakin da muke fitarwa muna kai su wadancan kasashen ne, to muna samun labaran irin mummunan ayyukan da wasu masu fitar da kayayyakin suke yi. Aikawa da kayayyakin da ba a bukatarsu, munanan kayayyaki, jinkiri wajen aikawa da kayan, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne masu muni.
mt0: <pad> But also the exporters and their employees have a responsibility. In the countries mentioned above, we have heard of bad behavior by some exporters. Sending unwanted goods, spoiled goods, delays in delivery, all these are bad things.</s>

en: Successful companies throughout the world have managed to keep their customers satisfied for 100 or 150 years.
hau: Akwai kamfanoni a duniya wadanda tsawon shekaru dari zuwa dari da hamsin suka yi suna kera kayayyaki da kuma sayar da su ga masu saye da kuma ci gaba da samun yardarsu.
mt0: <pad> There are companies in the world that have been producing and selling goods to customers for 100 to 150 years and still maintaining their trust.</s>

en: For example, imagine a German or Swiss company that has been selling a certain product for 150 or 160 years and it still has its customers in our country and other countries.
hau: A matsayin misali wani kamfani na kasar Jamus ko kuma Swiss kimanin shekaru dari da hamsin zuwa dari da sittin suna kera kayayyaki da kuma sayar da su kuma har ya zuwa yanzu suna da masu sayen kayayyakinsu a kasar mu da ma sauran kasashe.
mt0: <pad> For example, a German or Swiss company has been producing and selling goods for about 150 to 160 years and they still have customers in our country and other countries.</s>

en: Why?
hau: Saboda me?
mt0: <pad> Saboda me?</s>

en: Exporters must take these points into consideration.
hau: Wajibi ne masu fitar da kayayyaki su yi la'akari da wadannan abubuwa.
mt0: <pad> Manufacturers must take into account these things.</s>

en: This requires a culture, the culture of developing high-quality products that are supposed to be sent to foreign countries.
hau: Hakan lamari ne da ke bukatar wata al'ada; al'ada da kyautata aiki cikin kayayyakin da ake samarwa don amfani na cikin gida da kuma waje.
mt0: <pad> That is a matter that requires a culture; a culture and excellence in the production of products for domestic and foreign use.</s>

en: The issue of fighting economic corruption is also very important.
hau: Batun fada da ta'annuti wa tattalin arziki shi ma lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.
mt0: <pad> The fight against economic inequality is also a very important issue.</s>

en: As long as there is nobody on the inside to help an outsider, that outsider cannot give rise to economic corruption.
hau: Matukar dai wannan lalatacen mutumin bai sami wani lalataccen mutum a cikin gwamnati wanda zai taimaka masa ba, to ba zai sami damar yin ta'annuti ga tattalin arzikin ba.
mt0: <pad> Unless this poor person finds another poor person in the government to help him, he will not be able to make a profit from the economic boom.</s>

en: Therefore, government officials have a responsibility to be extremely sensitive in governmental organizations to the emergence and infiltration of economic corruption.
hau: A saboda haka jami'an gwamnati suna da wani nauyi a wuyansu wajen hana yaduwar fasadi na tattalin arziki a cikin cibiyoyin gwamnati.
mt0: <pad> For this reason, government officials have a responsibility to prevent the spread of economic fraud in government institutions.</s>

en: For example, when you examine a sample of chickens on a chicken farm and find out that a certain disease has started in that place, you do not show mercy because you know that if you fail to take action out of consideration for that particular chicken farm, then the consequences will not be limited to a few thousand chickens.
hau: A matsayin misali a lokacin da kuka fahimci cewa wata cuta ta kunno kai cikin gonan kaji, to babu wata rahama da tausayi da za ku nuna (wajen kawar da kajin da suka kamu da wannan cutar); saboda kun san cewa idan har kuka yi sako-sako, to kuwa cutarwa da za ta faru ba za ta takaita kawai ga wadansu dubban kaji ba ne; lamari ne da zai yadu, a saboda haka kuke daukan tsattsauran matakai.
mt0: <pad> For example, when you learn that a disease has started in the pigs, you will show no mercy or pitifulness; because you know that if you do not act quickly, the harm will not be limited to a few thousand pigs; it will spread, so you take extreme measures.</s>

en: The same is true of corruption.
hau: To shi ma fasadi na tattalin arziki haka yake.
mt0: <pad> corruption and economic inequality</s>

en: I am addressing to this point to our government officials: if you feel or see that there is a possibility for corruption in governmental organizations, you must not hesitate.
hau: Idan har a wani waje cikin cibiyoyin gwamnati ku ka ji ko kuma kuka ga wata alama ta fasadi na tattalin arziki - a nan ina magana ne da jami'an gwamnati - to bai kamata ku yi sako-sako ba.
mt0: <pad> If you have heard or seen any signs of economic fraud in government institutions - I'm talking to government officials - then you should not be afraid to report it.</s>

en: Economic corruption is a syndrome that spreads very fast and is highly contagious. Therefore, it is necessary to pay attention to this point.
hau: Cutar ta'annuti ga tattalin arziki tana daga cikin cututtuka masu hatsarin gaske da kuma yaduwa cikin sauri; a saboda haka wajibi ne a lura da hakan sosai.
mt0: <pad> Economic poisoning is one of the most dangerous and rapidly transmitted diseases; therefore, it is necessary to take careful care of it.</s>

en: Preparing a comprehensive plan for the development of the cooperative sector is one of the things that is absolutely necessary to do. The issue of our cooperative sector has been stressed in the policies specified in Article 44 of the Constitution.
hau: Daya daga cikin abubuwa na wajibi shi ne tsara cikakken shiri na ciyar da bangaren hadin gwuwai gaba; wanda a cikin wannan siyasa ta 44 mun yi ishara da wannan lamari na hadin gwuiwa wanda wajibi ne a aiwatar da hakan.
mt0: <pad> One of the responsibilities is to develop a comprehensive plan for the development of the cooperative sector; and in this policy 44 we have made reference to this cooperative issue which must be implemented.</s>

en: We need a complete and comprehensive policy for the cooperative sector and this is something that must be done.
hau: Mu na da bukatar wata siyasa cikakkiya a bangaren hadin gwuiwa.
mt0: <pad> We need a clear policy on integration.</s>

en: The points which were raised by one of the gentlemen about offering banking facilities to small businesses and other such issues can be taken care of through the cooperative sector.
hau: Kamar yadda daya daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya yi ishara da hakan ya ce ana iya amfani da irin rangwamin da bankuna suke bayar da dai sauransu, to za a iya cimma hakan ne a karkashin inuwar wannan hadin gwuiwan; wato mafi kyaun hanyar cimma hakan ita ce wannan hadin gwuiwan; hadin gwuiwa wace ta dace da hankali da kuma doka.
mt0: <pad> As one of the brothers indicated, that we can use the discounts that banks offer, etc., then we can do that under the umbrella of this union; that is, the best way to do that is through this union; a union that is logical and legal.</s>

en: This is practical. Another essential point is that we must make serious efforts to point out investment opportunities to the private sector.
hau: Wani lamarin na asali na gaba shi ne mu ba da muhimmanci ga batun bayyanar da damar zuba jari da ake da ita a kasar nan ga bangaren ‘yan kasuwa.
mt0: <pad> Another important issue is to highlight the investment opportunities available in the country to the business community.</s>

en: That is to say, those who are active in the private sector should know what the investment opportunities are. Everybody should be informed of the opportunities and the information should not just be available to a particular group of people.
hau: Wato wajibi ne bangaren ‘yan kasuwa su fahimci a ina ne ake da dama na zuba jari, wajibi ne kowa ya sami labari, kada ya zamanto wadansu ne kawai za su amfana da hakan.
mt0: <pad> The business community must understand where there are investment opportunities, it is necessary for everyone to be informed, not only some people will benefit from it.</s>

en: Those who have this information will be able to abuse it.
hau: Wadanda suke da labari za su yi mummunan amfani da hakan.
mt0: <pad> those who have information will make a bad use of it.</s>

en: Such information should be available to everybody.
hau: Wajibi ne bayanai su zamanto ga kowa da kowa.
mt0: <pad> The information must be available to everyone.</s>

en: Of course this issue was pointed out in previous administrations as well and certain things have been done in the 9th and 10th administrations, but what has been done is not enough.
hau: Wajibi ne bayyanar da komai a fili. Ko da yake a gwamnatocin da suka gabata an gabatar da hakan, a wancan gwamnatin da wannan ma an gudanar da ayyukan da yawa sai dai kuma ba su wadatar ba.
mt0: <pad> It is necessary to make everything transparent. Although it has been done in previous governments, both the previous and this government have done many things but they are not enough.</s>

en: It is necessary to take other actions in this regard.
hau: Wajibi ne a kara himma a wannan fagen.
mt0: <pad> It is necessary to be more ambitious in this area.</s>

en: I have written down other points which I will not discuss because it is almost time for adhan.
hau: To akwai wadansu abubuwan da na rubuta, to amma da ya ke lokacin salla ya gabato, zan tsallake su.
mt0: <pad> There are other things I wrote, but since the time of prayer is near, I'll skip it.</s>

en: By Allah's favor, those who love the country, the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic and those who are interested in the future of this nation will be encouraged by this meeting to have a more serious presence in the arena of economic activities.
hau: Ina fatan insha Allahu wannan zaman zai zamanto wani lamari da zai kara sanya mutanen da suke kaunar kasar nan da wannan al'umma da wannan tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma makomar wannan al'umma za su kara kaimi da himma, su kara irin ayyukan da suke yi cikin hikima da nuna sanin ya kamata.
mt0: <pad> I hope that this time will be a time that will make people who love this country, this nation, this system of the Islamic Republic and the future of this nation to take more initiative and courage, to increase the kind of work they are doing with wisdom and understanding.</s>

en: The slogan of "Intensified Effort and Labor", which I introduced last year, should be considered along with the issue of "Economic Jihad".
hau: Wannan take na ‘Rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru' da muka gabatar da shi a shekarar da ta gabata, to wajibi ne a gan shi tare da batun kokari na karfafa tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> The theme of "Work Hard and Live Long" that we announced last year, must be seen in the context of the efforts to strengthen the economic growth.</s>

en: By Allah's favor, everybody will work hard.
hau: Muna fatan kowa zai kara himma.
mt0: <pad> We hope everyone will be more willing to work harder.</s>

en: The future of the country is bright. The capacities of the country are extraordinary and unique.
hau: Makomar wannan kasar dai makoma ce mai kyau. irin karfi da albarkatun da kasar nan take da su abubuwa ne masu yawa.
mt0: <pad> The future of this country is very bright. The strengths and resources that the country has are many things.</s>

en: Thankfully there are many people in the country with good hearts, good determination, good and competent hands and insightful eyes.
hau: Alhamdu lillahi akwai zukata masu kyau da imani da himma da karfi a wannan kasar.
mt0: <pad> Alhamdulilah there are good hearts, faith, will and strength in this country.</s>

en: Our country has far too much potential to be considered a second rate country in the world.
hau: Wannan kasar dai tana da dama mai yawa da ta fi karfin a kira ta da sunan kasa mai daraja ta biyu a duniya.
mt0: <pad> This country has many advantages that make it the second most powerful country in the world.</s>

en: Our historical background, our cultural heritage, the capabilities of our people, our natural resources - all of these things dictate this fact to us.
hau: Tsawon tarihinmu, irin gado na al'adu da muke da su, irin karfi na mutane da albarkatun kasa dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suke mana ishara da hakan.
mt0: <pad> Our long history, our rich cultural heritage, our people's and land resources all these things are indicators that we can be proud of.</s>

en: Leader’s Public Address in Mashhad - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of a public address delivered on March 21, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution at Imam Ridha's shrine in the holy city of Mashhad.
hau: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i ya yi ne a ranar 21, Maris 2011 a lokacin ganawarsa da dubun dubatan mutane a haramin Imam Ridha (a.s) da ke birnin Mashhad a ranar farko ta sabuwar shekarar 1390 hijira shamsiyya:
mt0: <pad> The following is the translation of the speech made by the Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei on March 21, 2011 at his meeting with hundreds of people in the holy mosque of Imam Ridha (a.s) in Mashhad on the first day of the new year 1390 hijri shamsiyya.</s>

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
hau: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai
mt0: <pad> Da sunan Allah mai rahama mai jin jin</s>

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings upon the Holy Prophet, the most noble descendant of Adam, our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Al-Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate and infallible household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
hau: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu kuma Annabinmu Abul Kasim al-Mustafa Muhammad tare da Alayensa tsarkaka kuma zababbu shiryayyu masu shiryarwa kuma ma'asumai masu girma musamman ma Wanzajjen Allah (Imam al-Mahdi) a bayan kasa.
mt0: <pad> All praise be to Allah. May peace and blessings be upon our leader and prophet Muhammad with his holy family and the noblest messengers and saints, especially the Imam al-Mahdi (the last Prophet of Allah) in the earth.</s>

en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave me an opportunity to have this valuable experience again: being present at Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha's shrine - may our souls be sacrificed for his sake and God's greetings be upon him.
hau: Ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sake ba ni tsawon rai da kuma dacewar fahimtar irin matsayin da wannan waje mai albarka yake da shi; wato kasancewa a hubbaren mai girma Imam Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi sannan kuma amincin Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) a ranar farko ta shekara.
mt0: <pad> I thank Allah Almighty for giving me the long life and the right understanding of the significance of this holy place; to be in the holy shrine of the great Imam Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (our lives are his pledge and peace be upon him) on the first day of the year in the holy mosque of the great Imam Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (may our lives be his pledge and peace be upon him) on the first day of the year.</s>

en: I would like to congratulate all the dear brothers and sisters who have attended this great and impressive meeting on the auspicious occasion of Norouz and the beginning of the new year. The people who have gathered here are in fact a sample of the Iranian people.
hau: Ina isar da sakon taya murnar wannan idi na Norouz da kuma shigowar sabuwar shekara ga dukkanin 'yan'uwa maza da mata wadanda suka taru a wannan waje da kuma wannan taro mai girman gaske; shin a wannan farfajiya ce ko kuma wadanda suke waje a wajaje daban-daban, 'yan'uwa maza da mata da suke sauraren wannan jawabi.
mt0: <pad> I wish this Eid and the New Year to all my brothers and sisters who have gathered here and in this large meeting; whether in this courtyard or elsewhere, brothers and sisters who are listening to this speech.</s>

en: On the first day of the year, our dear people travel to the holy shrine of Imam Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha from nearby and distant cities and towns of the country in order benefit from the blessedness of this holy place.
hau: Alal hakika wannan taron jama'a wani misali ne na al'ummar Iran. A wannan rana, al'ummar mu masu girma daga wajaje daban-daban na kusa da nesa duk sun taro a wannan hubbare na Abul Hasan al-Ridha (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) da kuma samun albarkan wannan waje.
mt0: <pad> In fact, this crowd is a symbol of the people of Iran. On this day, our great people from all parts of the country, near and far, came together in this holy place of Abul Hasan al-Ridha (peace be upon him) and received the blessings of this place.</s>

en: Our dear brothers from the city of Mashhad are also present in this impressive gathering.
hau: Akwai kuma 'yan'uwa maza da mata mutanen garin Mashhad da suke wannan wajen.
mt0: <pad> There are also brothers and sisters from Mashhad who live here.</s>

en: I extend my greetings and congratulations to all of you.
hau: Ina mika gaisuwa ta ga kowa da kowa da kuma taya su murna.
mt0: <pad> I extend my greetings to everyone and wish them well.</s>

en: The Iranian New Year is a valuable opportunity for all Iranian people and for all Muslims who celebrate Norouz to contribute to the Islamic movement.
hau: Idin Nurouz na Iran ga dukkaninmu mutanen Iran da sauran musulmi na sauran kasashe da suke girmama wannan idi wata dama ce abar girmamawa da kuma amfani da ita a bangare na addini da yunkuri na Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> The Islamic holiday of Noruz for all of us Iranians and other Muslims in other countries is a special opportunity to use the occasion in our religion and the movement of Islam.</s>

en: This is the characteristic of Islam: all opportunities, all moments and all stages of life should be utilized to bring about perfection and spiritual and material progress for humanity. We Iranians can use this occasion to move towards what Islam has demanded from us and towards Islamic teachings and Islamic ahkaam [Islamic rules extracted from religious texts through Islamic jurisprudence].
hau: Mahangar Musulunci ita ce cewa: a yi kokarin amfanuwa da dukkanin damar da aka samu, da dukkanin yanayi na rayuwa, wajen samun kamala ta dan'adam, saboda samun ci gaba na duniya da lahira. Mu din nan al'ummar Iran muna iya amfani da wannan dama da wannan lokaci wajen aikata ayyukan da Musulunci ya umurce mu da aikatawa, wajen tabbatar da hukumce-hukumcen Musulunci da kuma koyarwarsa.
mt0: <pad> The Islamic view is that: to try to take advantage of all the available opportunities and conditions of life, for the human's perfection, for the development of the world and the eternal. We, the people of Iran, can use this opportunity and this time to do the tasks that Islam has commanded us to do, to enforce the principles and teachings of Islam and its doctrine.</s>

en: This is an opportunity for us to become familiar with the lofty goals of Islam.
hau: Mu sanar da kanmu manyan manufofi na Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> We have already explained the main purposes of Islam.</s>

en: Visiting one's relatives, paying attention to Allah the Exalted, learning good things from one another, gathering in religious and spiritual centers - these are valuable opportunities that we should benefit from.
hau: A cikin wadannan ranaku, wata dama ce da ya kamata a yi amfani da ita wajen sada zumunci, komawa da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, sauraren maganganu masu kyau daga bakin wasu da kuma taruwa a wajaje na addini.
mt0: <pad> In these days, it is an opportunity to be generous, return to God the Most High, listen to good words from others and congregate in religious places.</s>

en: The fact is that for many years, especially during the rule of the Islamic system, the honorable people of our country have used Norouz as an opportunity to engage in spirituality and to get closer to Allah the Exalted.
hau: Hakikanin lamarin shi ne tsawon wadannan shekaru musamman a lokacin da aka kafa hukuma ta Musulunci (a kasar Iran) al'ummar kasar mu sun yi amfani da wannan idi na Norouz wajen neman kusaci da Ubangiji Madaukakin Sarki.
mt0: <pad> The truth is that over the years, especially since the establishment of the Islamic republic (in Iran), our people have used this festival of Norooz to seek closeness with God the Most High.</s>

en: If you pay attention, you will notice that during the first few hours of the new year most people gather in religious centers and holy places to pray.
hau: Abin da ke tabbatar da hakan kuwa shi ne cewa idan kuka dubi daidai lokacin shigowar sabuwar shekarar, za ku ga cewa mafi yawan mutane suna taruwa ne a wajajen ibada, hubbarori, wajajen ziyara da masallatai sun shagaltu da addu'oi da ambaton Allah.
mt0: <pad> What confirms this is that if you look at the exact time of the new year, you will find that most people are gathered in places of worship, hubbars, holy sites and mosques to pray and praise God.</s>

en: The meaning of this significant move is that the Iranian nation uses this traditional occasion for religious purposes.
hau: Ma'anar hakan ita ce cewa al'ummar Iran suna kokarin amfanuwa da wannan alama da kuma bukukuwa na al'ada amfanuwa ta addini.
mt0: <pad> The meaning of this is that the people of Iran are trying to enjoy this symbol and celebration of the traditional culture as a spiritual pleasure.</s>

en: We should follow this prominent example in all affairs, and we should use Norouz to increase our knowledge, spirituality and piety and to practice Islamic ahkaam, Islamic teachings and Islamic ethics.
hau: Yana da kyau mu yi koyi da wannan misali cikin dukkanin lamurra, sannan yana da kyau mu yi amfani da idin Norouz wajen kara irini ilimin da mu ke da shi, ababen da suke karfafa ruhi, addini da tabbatar da hukumce-hukumcen Musulunci, da kyawawan halaye na Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> It is good for us to learn from this example in all things, and it is good for us to use the Eid of Noruz to increase our knowledge, those that strengthen our spirit, religion and confirm the Islamic laws and the good qualities of Islam.</s>

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will make all of us successful in this regard.
hau: Ina fatan Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai ba wa dukkaninmu, dukkanin al'ummar Iran dacewa cikin wannan aikin.
mt0: <pad> I hope that the Supreme Being will give us all, all Iranians, the chance to participate in this work.</s>

en: Today I will take this opportunity to speak about three issues.
hau: A yau a yayin wannan dama da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya samar da ita, zan yi magana ne kan wasu batutuwa guda uku.
mt0: <pad> Today, in this opportunity that Allah the Most High has given me, I will talk about three important issues.</s>

en: First I will present a brief report of the year 1389: I will consider the issue from a broad perspective and explain the orientation of the Iranian nation and officials in the year 1389. Then I will speak about the new year, which starts from today. I will speak about this year's slogan - namely, "Economic Jihad" - and the appropriate measures that should be taken.
hau: Batu na farko, shi ne dangane da abubuwan da aka aikata a shekarar 1389 (hijira shamsiyya) da ta kare, don mu ga a shekarar 1389 wasu abubuwa ne al'ummar Iran da kuma jami'an gwamnati suka aikata sannan kuma wasu hanyoyi suka bi. Batu na biyu dangane da wannan shekarar ce wacce ta faro a yau din nan; bisa la'akari da take da kuma sunan da aka ba wa wannan shekarar wato 'Shekarar Kokarin Bunkasa Tattalin Arziki' da kuma abubuwan da ya dace a aikata cikin shekarar.
mt0: <pad> The first is about the past year 1389 (H.S.), because we see what people and officials of the government did in 1389 and what paths they followed. The second is about this year which has just begun; taking into account the theme and name of this year, the Year of Economic Development, and what should be done during this year.</s>

en: In the third part of my speech I will speak about the regional issues: the issues of the Middle East, North Africa and the events that are happening in this Islamic region. I will discuss these issues in the light of the hypocrisy and plots of the enemies of the Islamic Ummah.
hau: Batu na uku kuma, ya shafi abubuwan da suke faruwa ne a wannan yankin; lamurran yankin gabas ta tsakiya, abubuwan da ke faruwa a arewacin Afirka da kuma abubuwan da ke faruwa a wannan yanki na Musulunci, bisa la'akari da irin kokarin da makiyan al'ummar musulmi suke yi na gurbata hakikanin abin da ke faruwar.
mt0: <pad> The third issue is about the current situation in this region; Middle East issues, North Africa issues and the current situation in this Muslim region, taking into account the efforts of the enemies of the Muslim community to distort the reality of what is happening.</s>

en: Regarding the first issue, I can say that last year's slogan - namely, "Intensified Effort and Labor" - was observed throughout the year. Our people managed to make intensified efforts in different areas.
hau: Dangane da batu na farko, lalle ina iya cewa sunan da aka ba wa shekara ta 1389 - wato 'Shekarar Rubanya Himma da Kuma Aiki Tukuru' - lalle an lura da wannan lamarin tsawon shekarar, sannan kuma al'ummar mu a bangarori daban-daban sun bayyanar da hakikanin himmar su da kuma rubanya ayyuka.
mt0: <pad> To the first point, I can certainly say that the name of the year 1389 - "Year of Great Activity and Braveness" - was really observed throughout the year, and our people in all parts of the country showed their true courage and braveness.</s>

en: Of course intensified effort and labor reveal their effects in the long term, but it is possible to see the signs of intensified effort and labor when you take a brief look at the year 1389, what the government officials did and how our dear people cooperated with their officials.
hau: Ko da yake sakamakon wannan himma mai girma da kuma aiki tukurun za a gansu da kuma fahimtar su ne a nan gaba; to amma a irin wannan kallo na farko-farko ma cikin yanayin shekara ta 1389 da kuma irin ayyukan da jami'an kasar nan suka aikata, da kuma abubuwan da mutane tare da taimakon jami'ansu suka aikata da kuma bayyanar da shi a fili, to kuwa ana iya ganin alamar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru.
mt0: <pad> Although the results of this great determination and hard work will be seen and understood in the future; but even in this first-hand look at the situation of 1389 and the activities of the national army, and what the people with their army have done and shown it publicly, we can see the sign of a double determination and hard work.</s>

en: The signs are clearly visible in many areas.
hau: Lalle ana iya ganin hakan a fagage da yawa.
mt0: <pad> However, this can be seen in many other fields.</s>

en: Let us start with science and technology.
hau: Bari mu fara daga batun ilimi da fasaha.
mt0: <pad> We're starting with education and technology.</s>

en: At the beginning of the year 1389 I found the opportunity to visit an important industrial center of the country. During the last few days of the year I found another opportunity to visit a technology exhibition, and I saw the long-term results of the year-long movement with my own eyes.
hau: A farkon shekarar 1389 - a ranakun idi - na sami damar kai ziyara daya daga cikin masana'antu masu matukar muhimmanci na kasar nan; sannan kuma a karshen watan Esfand (watan karshe na hijira Shamsiyya) na sake samun damar kai ziyara wajen baje kolin ayyuka na ilimi da fasaha inda da idanuwana na ga sakamakon wannan aiki na shekara guda.
mt0: <pad> In the beginning of 1389 - on Eid Day - I had the opportunity to visit one of the most important industries of the country; and in the end of Esfand (the last month of the Shamsiyya Hijri) I had the opportunity to visit a science and technology fair where I saw the result of this year's work.</s>

en: In the area of advanced science and technology, I would tell you that what we have achieved in the country is far more than what the people know about.
hau: Irin ci gaban da aka samu a fagen ilimi da fasaha a yau din nan a kasar nan nesa ba kusa ba ya fi abin da ake sanar da mutane cewa an cimma su; lalle zan iya bugun kirji in sanar da ku hakan.
mt0: <pad> The educational and scientific progress that has been made in the country today is far more than what is being reported to people; I can really be proud to tell you that.</s>

en: A prominent scientific movement started in different areas several years ago, and fortunately this movement has gained further momentum on a daily basis.
hau: Tun shekarun da suka gabata aka fara wannan gagarumin yunkuri na ilimi a fagage daban-daban, wanda abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a kowace rana sai dada ci gaba ake yi.
mt0: <pad> Since the years ago, this great educational effort has been undertaken in different fields, and the good news is that every day it's getting better and better.</s>

en: Once I quoted an infallible Imam (a.s.), saying, "Knowledge is grandeur." It means that knowledge is a source of power for nations and individuals.
hau: A wani lokaci a baya na taba karanto wata ruwaya da aka ruwaito ta daga wajen wani Ma'asumi (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) da ke cewa: 'Ilimi mulki ne', wato ilimi da masaniya lamari ne da zai samar da karfi ga wata al'umma da kuma wani mutum.
mt0: <pad> I once read a hadith from a Prophet (may Allah be praised of him) that "Knowledge is power", meaning knowledge and knowledgefulness is something that can give power to a community and a person.</s>

en: This is a characteristic of knowledge and technology.
hau: To ilimi da fasaha suna da irin wannan siffar.
mt0: <pad> Science and technology have the same character.</s>

en: Today the country is clearly moving towards obtaining knowledge in many areas, especially in newly-established and highly advanced fields.
hau: A yau yunkurin wannan kasar a fagen neman ilimi da fasaha a mafi yawan fagage musamman a cikin sabbin fagage lamari ne da ake ganinsa a fili.
mt0: <pad> Today the efforts of this country in the field of education and technology in most sectors, especially in the new sectors are clearly seen.</s>

en: Fortunately one can see that our scientists and youth are making accelerated progress in different areas - in biotechnology, in aerospace technology, in nanotechnology, in stem cell research, in producing crucial radiopharmaceuticals, in producing antineoplastic drugs, in producing wind turbines which decrease the country's dependence on oil to a large extent, in building supercomputers which are extremely important for the country, in technologies related to new sources of energy. All of these achievements require advanced knowledge.
hau: A bangarori daban-daban; a fagen ilimin yanayi, a fagen ilmin sararin samaniya, a fagen fasahar Nano, a fagen 'ya'yan halittu, a fagen kera na'urorin masu hangen nesa daban-daban masu muhimmanci, a fagen samar da magungunan cutar kansa, a fagen kera nau'ororin da suke taimakawa wajen rage irin dogaro da ake yi da man fetur, wajen kera na'urori masu muhimmanci ga kasar nan, a fagen fasahar makamashi -wadanda dukkanin wadannan fagagen an samu ci gaba a cikinsu - abin farin cikin shi ne cewa mutum yana iya ganin irin kokari ba kama hannun yaro da masananmu da masananmu matasa suke yi.
mt0: <pad> In different fields; in the field of meteorology, in the field of space science, in the field of nanotechnology, in the field of biotechnology, in the field of imaging devices of different kinds of important, in the field of cancer drugs, in the field of production of devices that help to reduce oil dependence, in the field of national machinery, in the field of energy technology - all these fields have been made progress in.</s>

en: As I said last night in my New Year address, the reports prepared by prestigious international centers show that in this area our country is moving forward faster than many countries in the world. These reports show that the pace of our progress is several times more than the average rate of progress in the world.
hau: Kamar yadda na fadi cikin sakon idin Nurouz a daren jiya cewa cibiyoyin bincike daban-daban na duniya sun bayyana cewar a wannan fagen kan kasar ku tana gaban mafi yawa daga cikin kasashen duniya, sannan kuma irin ci gaban da ake samu a kasar nan ya rubanya irin ci gaba na tsaka-tsaki na duniya.
mt0: <pad> As I said in my Eid message last night that various international research agencies have shown that the country is ahead of most of the world's countries in this field, and the development it has seen in the country has doubled the development of the middle-class of the world.</s>

en: There are 2, 3 important points about scientific and technological progress which I would like to discuss now.
hau: Akwai wadansu batutuwa guda biyu zuwa uku masu muhimmanci da suke cikin wannan lamari na ci gaban ilimi da fasaha wanda ni ina ganin ya dace in yi bayani kansu.
mt0: <pad> There are two or three important issues in this matter of education and technology that I think it is appropriate for me to discuss.</s>

en: The first point is that most of the scientists who are doing these things are young.
hau: Batu na farko shi ne cewa mafi yawa daga cikin masanan da suke gudanar da ayyukansu a wannan fagen, matasa ne.
mt0: <pad> The first thing is that most of the professionals who work in this field are young.</s>

en: The average age of the scientists who are involved in these endeavors is 35. That is to say, they are mostly young, and it is necessary to trust these youth. Of course there are also experienced and faithful professors who are involved in these scientific endeavors, and this is very valuable.
hau: Shekarun wadannan masana dai shi ne shekaru talatin zuwa talatin da biyar - wato mafi yawansu matasa ne - wanda wajibi ne a dogara da wadannan matasan. Tabbas akwai tsoffin masana masu imani da suke gudanar da ayyukansu a wannan fagen, wanda kuma wajibi ne a yi kokarin amfanuwa da hakan.
mt0: <pad> The age of these experts is 30 to 35 years old - that is, most of them are young - and we must depend on those young. Of course, there are faithful older experts who are still working in this field, and we must try to benefit from their work.</s>

en: The next point is that those who do these impressive things have a lot of self-confidence, and this self-confidence is the main asset.
hau: Batu na gaba shi ne cewa mutanen da suke gudanar da wadannan ayyuka masu girma, mutane ne da suke da ruhi mai karfi, mutane ne da suka dogara da kansu; wanda hakan shi ne babban jari.
mt0: <pad> The second thing is that the people who perform these great works are people with a strong spirit, people who are self-reliant; and that is a great capital.</s>

en: Manpower is the main asset, and this is what our country enjoys.
hau: Jari na asali shi ne karfi na mutane. Wannan shi ne abin da kasar mu take da shi.
mt0: <pad> The real wealth is the power of the people. This is what our country is known for.</s>

en: Our youth are making progress in this arena with high morale, and they believe that they can do anything, anything for which the country has the necessary infrastructures.
hau: Matasan mu suna ci gaba da gudanar da wannan aiki cikin karfin gwuiwa, sannan kuma sun yarda da cewa dukkanin wadannan ayyuka wadanda tushe ne na ci gaban wannan kasar lamurra ne da za su iya gudanar da su.
mt0: <pad> Our young people are continuing to carry out this work with great energy, and they believe that all these tasks that are the basis of the development of this country are responsibilities that they can fulfill.</s>

en: The next point regarding the issue of scientific progress is that the chain of science, technology, production and commercializing the products is in the process of being established. And this chain is very important.
hau: Batu na gaba cikin lamarin ci gaban ilimi shi ne cewa silsilar ilimi, fasaha, samar da ilimin da ake bukata da kuma sayar da shi - wanda hakan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske - lamari ne da a halin yanzu ake ci gaba da gina shi.
mt0: <pad> The first point in the development of knowledge is that the pyramid of knowledge, technology, provision of needy knowledge and its sale - which is a very important thing - is now being built.</s>

en: That is to say, we produce knowledge, turn it into technology, develop products, market the products through international trade and produce wealth for the country.
hau: Wato ana samar da ilimi sannan a mayar da shi zuwa ga wata fasaha, a samar da abin da ake bukata sannan kuma a kai wannan abin da aka samar din zuwa ga kasuwannin duniya wanda hakan zai samar wa wannan kasa da dukiya ne.
mt0: <pad> The creation of knowledge and its transformation into technology, the production of necessities and the export of this produced product to the world market that will provide the country with wealth.</s>

en: This is the way in which production of knowledge contributes to national wealth and addresses the needs of the people.
hau: Hakan mayar tafarkin samar da ilimi zuwa ga dukiya ta kasa ne da kuma biyan bukatun mutane.
mt0: <pad> It is a way of transforming education into national property and meeting the people's needs.</s>

en: Our dear people should know that all economic experts - both the experts who agree with the economic views of the current administration and the experts whose economic views are different from the views of the current administration - unanimously agree that redistributing subsidies is necessary, essential and very constructive.
hau: Yana da kyau al'ummar mu masu girma su san cewa dukkanin masana tattalin arziki - shin wadanda mahangarsu ta tattalin arziki ta yi daidai da ta gwamnati mai ci ne, ko kuma wadanda ra'ayinsu na tattalin arziki ya saba wa mahangar gwamnatin - dukkaninsu sun yi amanna da cewa manufantar da rangwamin da gwamnatin take bayarwa lamari ne da ya zama wajibi sannan kuma mai amfani matuka.
mt0: <pad> It is good for our noble people to know that all economic experts - whether they agree with the government's economic policy, or disagree with the government's economic policy - have believed that rationalizing the government's subsidies is a necessary and very beneficial measure.</s>

en: Entering this arena was very difficult, and the ground was not fully prepared.
hau: Shiga cikin wannan fagen wani aiki ne mai wahalar gaske; sannan kuma fagagen aiwatar da hakan ba a riga da an samar da su ba.
mt0: <pad> Entering this field is a difficult task; and the frameworks for implementing it are not yet established.</s>

en: Thankfully this work has already been initiated.
hau: Alhamdu lillahi a halin yanzu dai an riga da an fara wannan aikin.
mt0: <pad> Alhamdulilah, this work has already been started.</s>

en: To be fair, the cooperation between the government and the people was excellent.
hau: Kuma alal hakika hadin kan da ake samu tsakanin gwamnati da al'umma a cikin wannan aiki, hadin kai ne mai kyau.
mt0: <pad> And really the cooperation between government and the people in this work is a good cooperation.</s>

en: The people offered excellent cooperation when practicing the Subsidy Redistribution Law. The effects of this policy will gradually become clear in the future, although some of the positive effects have already revealed themselves.
hau: Yunkurin mutane a wannan fagen yunkuri ne mai kyaun gaske. A sannu a hankali za a ga tasirin hakan; duk kuwa da cewa a halin yanzu ma an fara ganin tasirinsa mai kyau.
mt0: <pad> The efforts of people in this field are very good. It will be seen slowly; although it is already beginning to show its positive effects.</s>

en: The primary goal of the law is to distribute subsidies in a fair way. The government distributes subsidies among the people.
hau: Manufa mai muhimmanci na wannan aikin, a matakin farko, ita ce raba irin rangwamin da gwamnati take bayarwa tsakanin mutane cikin adalci.
mt0: <pad> The main purpose of this work, in the first place, is to provide fairness in the distribution of government benefits among people.</s>

en: This is a great leap towards establishing social justice.
hau: Hakan wani mataki mai girma ne da aka taka, wajen tabbatar da adalci na zamantakewa.
mt0: <pad> That is a great step forward in the pursuit of social justice.</s>

en: Managing the consumption of the country's resources - especially water and energy resources - is the second goal.
hau: Wata manufar kuma ta daban, ita ce gudanar da albarkatun kasa (yadda ya dace); ciki kuwa har da ruwa da makamashi.
mt0: <pad> Another goal is to manage the land resources (wisely); including water and energy.</s>

en: I named the 1387 as "The Year of Reforming the Norms of Consumption" meaning being economical and avoiding waste.
hau: Shekaru biyun da suka gabata, mun sanya wa shekarar sunan "Shekarar Gyara Yadda Ake Amfani Da Albarkatun Kasa"; tsumi da tattali da kuma nesantar almubazzaranci.
mt0: <pad> Two years ago, we named the year "Year of Improving the Use of National Resources"; saving and cutting back on wastage and avoiding waste.</s>

en: The Subsidy Redistribution Law is one of the ways in which we can truly reform the norms of consumption.
hau: Wannan daya ne daga cikin hanyoyin da za mu iya gyara irin yadda mu ke amfani da albarkatun kasa yadda ya dace na hakika; wanda ya zuwa yanzu dai an ga tasirin hakan.
mt0: <pad> This is one of the ways we can improve our use of natural resources in a more efficient and effective way; and so far we have seen some results.</s>

en: Energy consumption has been reduced during the few months that the Subsidy Redistribution Law has been practiced, and this is beneficial to the country.
hau: Cikin wadannan 'yan watannin da aka shafe ana aiwatar da wannan shiri na manufantar da irin rangwamin da gwamnati take bayarwar, yadda ake amfani da makamashi ya sauko kasa sosai; wanda hakan lamari ne da zai amfani kasar nan.
mt0: <pad> In the last few months, as a result of the government's initiative to implement the reductions in energy use, the energy consumption has been reduced significantly; which will benefit the country.</s>

en: Wasteful use of bread and flour - which are great divine blessings and a lot of efforts go into producing them - has been reduced. Consumption has been balanced in this regard. This is among the benefits we have already obtained.
hau: Irin yadda ake almubazzaranci da biredi da yadda ake zubar da shi da kuma lalata alkama - wanda babbar ni'ima ce ta Ubangiji sannan kuma cikin wahalhalu ake samo ta - ya ragu ainun, an sami daidaito cikin yadda ake amfani da shi.
mt0: <pad> The waste of bread and the destruction of wheat - which is a great blessing of God and a difficult harvest - has been reduced, and there has been a more even use of it.</s>

en: Of course, by Allah's favor, there will be many other benefits in the future, and reforming the economic structure is among these benefits.
hau: Wannan daya ne daga cikin irin alfanun da aka samu kuma da yardar Allah a nan gaba ne za a ga amfanin hakan sosai. Haka nan gyara yanayin tattalin arziki ma yana daga cikin wannan lamarin.
mt0: <pad> This is one of the benefits that has been gained and with God's help we will see the full benefit of it in the future. The economic improvement is also part of this.</s>

en: The increase in non-oil exports was another sign of intensified effort and labor in the economic arena.
hau: Haka nan kuma daga cikin ayyukan da suke nuni da rubanya himma a fagen tattalin arziki, shi ne kara irin kayayyakin da ake fita da su waje wadanda ba man fetur ba.
mt0: <pad> Another of the measures that show the reorientation of the economic effort is to increase the export of non-petroleum products.</s>

en: Unfortunately our country has depended on oil exports since decades ago.
hau: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa shekaru aru-aru kenan kasafin kudin mu ya dogara ne da man fetur.
mt0: <pad> The sad part is that for years our budget has been dependent on oil.</s>

en: All economists who care about our country reject this policy, but we have been used to this state of affairs. It is wrong to export oil and use the money to manage the country.
hau: Hakan kuwa abu ne wanda dukkanin masana tattalin arziki masu kishi suke yin watsi da shi; an saba da wannan hanya a wannan kasa ta mu. A tono man fetur, a sayar sannan kuma a ci gaba da gudanar da kasa da kudin da aka samu; wannan hanya ce da take cike da kuskure.
mt0: <pad> That is what all egoistic economic experts ignore; this is the way we have been doing in this country. Mine oil, sell it and run the country with the money; this is a very wrong way.</s>

en: Many years ago I said that one of my wishes is that one day we will be able to run the country without exporting even one single drop of oil.
hau: Mu dai shekara da shekaru kenan na fadi cewa daya daga cikin fatan da nake da shi shi ne a sami wata ranar da za mu iya gudanar da wannan kasar ba tare da mun sayar da man fetur ba idan bukatar hakan ta taso.
mt0: <pad> For years I have said that one of my hopes is that one day we can run this country without having to sell oil if the need arises.</s>

en: This has not happened so far. Of course it is very difficult to do this.
hau: Tabbas ba aiki ne mai sauki ba, aiki ne mai tsanannin wahala.
mt0: <pad> Tabbas is not a simple task, it is a difficult task.</s>

en: Increasing our non-oil exports helps us move closer to this goal, and this is already happening.
hau: Kara irin kayayyakin da ake sayarwa wadanda ba man fetur ba lamari ne da zai kusata mu da manufar da muke da ita.
mt0: <pad> Making the most of non-petroleum products is a step that will bring us closer to our goal.</s>

en: A great leap was made in this regard in the year 1389.
hau: An aiwatar da ayyuka masu girma a shekarar 1389 a wannan fagen.
mt0: <pad> 1389 saw large works in this field.</s>

en: Confronting the sanctions in an intelligent and firm manner is one of the things that shows intensified effort and labor in the economic arena.
hau: Haka nan kuma daga cikin abubuwan da suke tabbatar da rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru a fagen tattalin arziki shi ne yadda gwamnati cikin hikima ta tinkari takunkumin da kasashen yammaci karkashin jagorancin Amurka da kuma biyayya ido rufe na wasu gwamnatocin Turai suka sanya wa Iran.
mt0: <pad> Another example of the government's determination and hard work in the economic field is how it has managed to overcome the sanctions imposed by Western powers under the leadership of the United States and some European governments.</s>

en: Since the beginning of year 1389 they have been trying to intensify their sanctions on Iran.
hau: Tun daga farkon shekarar 1389 a tunaninsu sun kara irin takunkumin da suka sanya wa Iran.
mt0: <pad> From the beginning of 1389, in their opinion, they have increased the pressure on Iran.</s>

en: According to their calculations, the Islamic Republic and the Iranian nation should have been brought to their knees in 5-6 months. This was what they thought.
hau: Su da kansu cikin lissafin da suka yi - wanda labarin hakan yana iso mana - su da kansu suna fadin cewa wannan takunkumi kan cikin watanni biyar zuwa shida zai dunkufar da Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma al'ummar Iran; wannan shi ne zaton da suke yi.
mt0: <pad> They themselves in their calculations - which we know - they themselves say that this sanctions will destroy the Islamic Republic and the people of Iran in five to six months; that's their estimate.</s>

en: Through the sanctions they wanted to make life so difficult for the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic that the people would protest against the Islamic Republic. This was their goal.
hau: Suna tunannin cewa ta hanyar wannan takunkumi za su sanya lamurra su zamanto masu wahalar gaske ga al'ummar Iran da kuma takura fage wa al'ummar Iran ta yadda su da kansu za su fito don nuna rashin amincewarsu da Jamhuriyar Musulunci; wannan ita ce manufarsu.
mt0: <pad> They think that through this ban they will make things much worse for the people of Iran and force the people of Iran to come out and show their discontent with the Islamic Republic; that is their goal.</s>

en: A clever and firm policy was adopted against these sanctions, and the sword of the enemy became blunt.
hau: An gudanar da wani aiki cikin hikima wajen fada da wannan takunkumi ta yadda aka dushe kaifin wukar makiyan.
mt0: <pad> The strategy was successful in combating this threat so that the sharpness of the enemy's sword was dulled.</s>

en: The enemy did not manage to achieve its goals through these sanctions.
hau: Makiya sun gagara cimma manufarsu ta hanyar wadannan takunkumi.
mt0: <pad> The bandits failed to achieve their goal through these measures.</s>

en: Today westerners admit that imposing sanctions on Iran is no longer effective.
hau: A yau su da kansu mutanen kasashen yammacin suke fadin cewa sanya wa Iran takunkumi dai ba shi da wani amfani.
mt0: <pad> Today, the Western people themselves say that imposing sanctions on Iran is of no avail.</s>

en: Our country is an oil exporter, but we used to import huge amounts of gasoline, which is produced from oil.
hau: Daya daga cikin matsalolin aikin mu tsawon lokaci shi ne wannan; mu din nan kasa ce mai fitar da man fetur, to amma kuma muna shigowa da mai din daga waje.
mt0: <pad> One of our long-term problems is this; we are a country that exports oil, but we also import oil from abroad.</s>

en: They said that this was the weakness of the Islamic Republic and that they would block gasoline imports.
hau: Don haka suke fadin cewa wannan shi ne bangaren raunin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, ba za mu bari a shigo da man ba.
mt0: <pad> So they say that this is the weakest part of the Islamic Republic, we will not allow oil to be brought in.</s>

en: Thanks to their sanctions, our government officials started to think of a way to produce gasoline, and their efforts helped our country become self-sufficient in gasoline.
hau: Sakamakon wannan takunkumi na su jami'an mu sun shiga cikin tunani; sun yi kokarinsu, sannan kuma muka zamanto ba ma bukatar shigowa da man fetur.
mt0: <pad> Because of this ban, our staff went into deep thought; they tried their best, and we have become independent of oil imports.</s>

en: I heard similar things from some of the young scientists at the technology exhibition which I visited last month.
hau: Wannan lamari ne da na ji shi daga bakunan wadannan matasa masana a ziyarar da na kai wajen baje kolin da aka gudanar a karshen watan Esfand.
mt0: <pad> This is what I heard from these young men when I visited the fair held in the end of Esfand.</s>

en: They told me, "We wanted to build a machine, and we went abroad to buy the required parts, but they told us that they would not sell them to us because of the sanctions, so we realized that we had to manufacture the required parts as well.
hau: Sun gaya min cewa muna son mu kera wannan na'urar, mun tafi waje don samo shi, sai suka ce mana ai ku kuna karkashin takunkumi ne, ba za su ba mu ba; sai muka fahimci cewa lalle wajibi ne mu samar da hakan da kanmu.
mt0: <pad> They told me that we want to make this machine, we went outside to get it, they said that you are under sanctions, they won't give us; then we realized that we had to make it ourselves.</s>

en: We came back and tried to produce those parts, and we succeeded to do so without the help of foreigners." This is the clever approach.
hau: Sai muka dawo gida, muka yi tunani, muka sha wahalhalu, mu ka yi kokari, har muka kera wannan na'urar ba tare da dogaro da baki 'yan kasashen waje ba.
mt0: <pad> We came home, thought, suffered, tried, and finally made this machine without the help of foreigners.</s>

en: According to government reports, 1.6 million job opportunities were created in the year 1389. If this report is accurate, the number is half a million more than the expected job opportunities.
hau: Rahoton gwamnati yana fadin cewa a shekarar 1389 an samar da guraban aiki miliyan daya da dubu dari shida; wanda idan har wannan rahoton haka yake, to kenan an samar da karin guraban aiki dubu dari biyar kenan sama da abin da aka yi tsammanin samarwa.
mt0: <pad> The government report says that in 1389 there were 1.6 million jobs created; which if true, then that is 500 more than what was expected to be created.</s>

en: Good achievements have also been made in such areas as housing projects, construction of highways and road systems, and electronic services - all of which are related to the infrastructures of the country.
hau: A fagen samar da matsuguni a karkara, a fagen samar da gidaje a birane da kuma samar da manyan hanyoyi da tituna da kuma fagen isar da sako na zamani da sauransu da sauransu - wadanda dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ayyuka ne na tushe da kuma gina kasa - lalle an aiwatar da ayyuka masu kyau.
mt0: <pad> In the field of rural housing, in the field of urban housing and in providing major roads and streets and modern transport systems and so on - all of which are fundamental and building works - certainly good work has been done.</s>

en: These are the economic achievements.
hau: Wannan a bangaren tattalin arziki kenan.
mt0: <pad> This is the economic aspect.</s>

en: Many achievements have been made in other areas as well, but I will not discuss them for lack of time.
hau: A sauran bangarori ma an aiwatar da ayyuka masu yawa, to da yake lokacin da muke da shi iyakantacce ne za mu wuce su kawai.
mt0: <pad> In other areas, many activities have also been carried out, although the time we have is limited, we will just pass it.</s>

en: In any case, thankfully it is clear that the year 1389 was truly "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor".
hau: Ala kulli hal abin da ya bayyana mana a shekarar 1389 shi ne cewa alhamdu lillahi wannan shekarar, da dukkanin ma'anar kalma, shekara ce ta rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru.
mt0: <pad> However, what has been clear to us in 1389 is that alhamdu lillahi this year, with all the meaning of the word, was a year of doubled effort and tireless work.</s>

en: Of course the year 1389 does not have any special significance in itself. This year, next year and the following years will all be "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor".
hau: Ko da yake shekarar 1389 ba ta da wata siffa da ta kebanta da ita; wannan shekarar ma, shekara mai zuwa ma, shekaru goma masu zuwa ma, (dukkaninsu) shekarar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru ne.
mt0: <pad> Although the year 1389 has no special features; this year, the next year, the ten years to come, (all) are years of redoubled effort and tireless work.</s>

en: The Iranian nation and its officials should make intensified efforts all the time so that we can achieve the position that the Iranian nation deserves.
hau: Al'ummar Iran da kuma dukkanin jami'an gwamnati a ko wani mukami suke kuwa wajibi ne su zamanto masu gagarumar himma da kuma aiki tukuru su rubanya ayyukan da suke yi don mu sami isa ga wajen da ya dace da al'ummar Iran, insha Allahu.
mt0: <pad> The people of Iran and all government officials in every rank are responsible to be very ambitious and hardworking to increase the work they do to achieve the place that is right for the people of Iran, insha Allahu.</s>

en: However, experts believe that at this point in time economic issues are more important and more urgent than all other issues of the country.
hau: To sai dai a ra'ayin masana, a wannan lokacin batun tattalin arziki ya fi komai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> But according to experts, at this time the economic issue is more important than any other.</s>

en: If our country manages to make jihad-like efforts in economic areas and if the big leap that has been made is coupled with other leaps, this will undoubtedly produce great results for the country, for our progress and for the grandeur of the Iranian nation.
hau: Idan har kasar mu mai girma ta samu nasarar yunkurawa a fagen tattalin arziki, to wannan gagarumin yunkuri zai hadu da wanda za a yi nan gaba, to ko shakka babu zai yi tasiri cikin kasar nan da ci gabanta da kuma daukakar al'ummar Iran.
mt0: <pad> If our great country has succeeded in a revolution in the field of economic reform, this great effort will be combined with the future one, it will undoubtedly have an impact on the country and its development and the pride of the people of Iran.</s>

en: In this regard the important criterion is the accelerated economic growth which has been specified in the fifth development plan - a growth of at least 8 percent.
hau: Abin da yake da muhimmanci a wannan fagen, shi ne samun ci gaban kasa bisa mizanin da aka tsara cikin shirin ci gaban kasa na shekaru biyar; wato alal akalla a samu ci gaba kashi takwas cikin dari.
mt0: <pad> The most important in this field is to achieve the growth of the country according to the benchmarks set out in the five-year development plan; that is, to achieve at least eight percent growth.</s>

en: Productivity should be a large portion of this growth.
hau: Kaso mai girma zai shafi irin karfin da muke da shi ne wajen amfani da karfin da muke da shi a cikin kasa yadda ya dace.
mt0: <pad> The greatest impact will be on our ability to use the energy in the country effectively.</s>

en: In my speech on the first day of the year 1388, I made a few points about the issue of extravagance and the problems that exist in the area of productivity.
hau: Shekaru biyun da suka gabata, a irin wannan jawabi na sabuwar shekara, na yi magana kan batun tsumi da matsalolin da suke cikin yadda ake amfani da albarkatun kasa.
mt0: <pad> Two years ago, in the same New Year's Day address, I talked about climate change and problems with the use of natural resources.</s>

en: The people should know these things.
hau: Wajibi ne mutane su fahimci wadannan abubuwa.
mt0: <pad> People need to understand these things.</s>

en: I recommend that our government officials speak to the people about the importance of increasing the share of productivity in total economic growth of the country. They should tell the people how important it is to increase the share of productivity in economic growth of the country and how important it is to decrease the difference between the income of the poor and the rich.
hau: Ina kiran jami'an kasar nan da su sanar da mutane wajibcin da ke cikin karfafa kason ci gaban tattalin arziki; su bayyana musu irin muhimmancin da ke cikin kara irin kason ci gaban tattalin arziki a kasar nan da kuma rage irin tazarar kudaden shiga tsakanin mutane.
mt0: <pad> I call on the officials of the country to inform the people of the need for economic development; to tell them the importance of boosting economic development in the country and reducing the gap in incomes between people.</s>

en: Such differences are not favorable to us. Islam does not approve of such differences.
hau: Wannan tazarar dai ba abu ne da muke so ba; Musulunci bai amince da hakan ba.
mt0: <pad> This separation is not something we do; Islam does not allow it.</s>

en: They should try to do these things according to the fifth development plan.
hau: Wajibi ne su yi iyakacin kokarinsu da kuma yin aiki tukuru don cimma abin da aka tsara cikin wannan shiri na shekaru biyar na ci gaban kasa.
mt0: <pad> They must do all their best and work hard to achieve the objectives set out in this five-year plan for national development.</s>

en: Decreasing the unemployment rate is among the crucial issues of the country.
hau: Rage yawan rashin aikin yi da kuma kara guraban aiki a kasar nan suna daga cikin lamurra masu muhimmanci kuma na asasi.
mt0: <pad> The reduction of unemployment and the creation of more jobs in the country are two important and fundamental issues.</s>

en: Increasing private investments and helping the private sector to invest in economic projects of the country are also among the crucial issues.
